blog.name: ninewheels
blog.title: You better you better you bet
blog.description: Alex. Writer. Director. Actor. The astoundingly lucky boyfriend of miss-nerdstiles. Most frequently blogged fandoms include Animorphs, Evangelion, all Joss Whedon shows, Aaron Sorkin shows (mostly West Wing and Newsroom), The OA, Marvel, Deadwood, Pokemon, Game of Thrones (positive), Kingdom Hearts, and musical theatre just generally.

summary: Based on the comic source material, I know Goose might turn out to be an alien, but I really just want them to be a normal-ass...
body: Based on the comic source material, I know Goose might turn out to be an alien, but I really just want them to be a normal-ass kitty that goes on fun space adventures with their hooman.

summary: Super Articulate: Marvel Legends Captain Marvel Part 1
title: Super Articulate: Marvel Legends Captain Marvel Part 1
body:
Super Articulate: Marvel Legends Captain Marvel Part 1. @TroyBrownfield takes a look at the #CaptainMarvel figure assortment! #toys #collectibles

Greetings, Graphic Policy Readers! It’s good to be back in action figure coverage land; thank you for having me. Today, we’re taking a look at a part of the Marvel Legends Captain Marvel “Kree Sentry” assortment, but first let’s play a bit of catch-up with one exclusive that came out last year.

Marvel Legends Thanos (Wal-Mart Exclusive)

This guy was supposed to be out in spring of 2018, but…

View On WordPress

blog.name: billybatson-rates-dogs
blog.title: S H A Z A M !

question: Are you still homeless?
answer: Kinda sorta………. It’s fine though! I sleep in the boiler room in a old apartment building. It’s nice and warm in there, and I have a bunch of blankets that people left behind in a laundromat that are really comfy to sleep in! Plus there’s a lock on the door and everything so no one’ll steal my stuff! :D

reblog.comment: Kinda sorta………. It’s fine though! I sleep in the boiler room in a old apartment building. It’s nice and warm in there, and I have a bunch of blankets that people left behind in a laundromat that are really comfy to sleep in! Plus there’s a lock on the door and everything so no one’ll steal my stuff! :D

Plus there’s a lock on the door and everything so no one’ll steal my stuff! :D
